name: SAWMILL MASSACRE
description: THIS IS ANOTHER PRETTY SIMPLE HORROR GAME. PART OF THE MODELS I TAKEN FROM HERE https://elbolilloduro.itch.io/. IF YOU WANT TO HELP IN FURTHER DEVELOPMENT, THEN LEAVE DETAILED COMMENTS SO THAT I CAN DO WORK ON ERRORS. ALSO IF THERE IS A WILL TO SUPPORT THE DEVELOPMENT WITH A PENNY, THEN HERE https://www.donationalerts.com/r/steelfence_games. HAVE A NICE GAME.
